// components/LogoutButton.js
import React from'react';import{Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogoutButton=()=>{const{logout}=React.useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=async()=>{await logout();navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"});};export default LogoutButton;
